sections.heading: 27|Creating metropolitan housing authority
sections.text: Effective:September 6, 2012Latest Legislation:House Bill 408 - 129th General AssemblyPDF:Download Authenticated PDF(A) Whenever the director of development has determined that there is need for a housing authority in any portion of any county that compris

sections.heading: the Revised Code do not limit the power of an authority to vest in a bondholder the right, in the event of a default by such authority, to take possession of a housing project or cause the appointment of a receiver thereof or acquire title thereto through foreclosure proceedings, free from all the r
sections.text: the Revised Code do not limit the power of an authority to vest in a bondholder the right, in the event of a default by such authority, to take possession of a housing project or cause the appointment of a receiver thereof or acquire title thereto through foreclosure proceedings, free from all the restrictions imposed by such sections.
